entry.title: Awesome Firebase Updates on Feb 22, 2022
entry.content:
Featured (new releases)

  • ğŸ”§ (Unofficial) Firebase Admin SDK for PHP (â­2.4k) - The Firebase Admin PHP SDK enables access to Firebase services from privileged environments (such as servers or cloud) in PHP.

Mobile

  • ğŸ“ App Distribution App Bundles - Support for Android App Bundles (AAB) is officially supported in App Distribution.

CLI & Editor / iOS

  • ğŸ“– Storage in Emulator Suite - Emulator suite is now complete!

Other / iOS

  • ğŸ”§ FireCMS - FireCMS is an open source headless CMS and admin panel built by developers for developers. It generates CRUD views based on your configuration.

entry.title: Awesome Firebase Updates on Jul 06, 2021
entry.content:
Featured (new releases)

  • ğŸ“– App Check - Protect your backend resources from abuse, such as billing fraud or phishing.
  • ğŸ“– Firestore Data Bundles - Data Bundles are static query results for CDN caching to speed first page loads.
  • ğŸ“– Modular Web SDK (v9) - Import only what you need reducing SDK size up to 80%.

Firebase Extensions

  • ğŸ”§ Firebase Extensions - Firebase Extensions provide extended functionality to your apps without the need to research, write, or debug code on your own.
  • ğŸ”§ Experimental Firebase Extensions (â­248) - laboratory for new extensions created by Firebase.
  • ğŸ”§ Stripe Extensions (â­461) - Official Stripe subscriptions and invoices extensions.
  • ğŸ”§ MessageBird Extensions (â­11) - Official MessageBird extension to send messages via the MessageBird Converstations API.
  • ğŸ”§ Algolia Extensions (â­118) - Official Algolia extension to enable full text search of Cloud Firestore with Algolia.
  • ğŸ”§ Mailchimp Extensions (â­20) - Official Mailchimp extension to sync Firebase Authentication events to create member tags, merge fields, and member events with Mailchimp.
  • ğŸ”§ Typesense Extension for Full-Text Search (â­168) - Official Typesense extension to add full-text search in Firestore, by syncing the data to Typesense (â­24k), an OSS alternative to Algolia.

Web

  • ğŸ”Œ GeoFirestore (â­509) - Location-based querying and filtering using Firebase Firestore.

Server-side (Cloud Functions, BigQuery etc) / iOS

  • ğŸ”Œ Pyrebase (â­2.1k) - A simple python wrapper for the Firebase API.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firecode (â­0) - A light, fast, and memory-efficient collection traversal library for Firestore and Node.js.

CLI & Editor / iOS

  • ğŸ”§ asdf-firebase (â­18) - An asdf-vm plugin for firebase-tools. Manage your Firebase CLI without Node.js or npm! Great for python, golang, c++ & java Firebase projects.

Other / iOS

  • ğŸ“¹ Firebase Summit 2020 - All Firebase talks @ the Firebase Summit 2020.

Follow / Official

  • ğŸ“¹ Firebase YouTube
  • ğŸ“ Firebase Blog
  • ğŸ¦ @firebase
  • ğŸ‘¤ Firebase Facebook
  • ğŸ”Š The Firebase Podcast - This is the place where we dive deep into Firebase products and learn new tips and tricks along the way.

entry.title: Awesome Firebase Updates on Oct 09, 2019
entry.content:
Official Docs & Quickstarts

  • ğŸ“– Firebase Documentation - Official Firebase Documentation.
  • ğŸ”§ Firebase Status Dashboard - This page provides status information on the services that are part of Firebase.
  • ğŸ’¡ Firebase Quickstarts - Official Firebase Quickstarts.
  • ğŸ’¡ Google Codelabs | Firebase - Google Developers Codelabs provide a guided, tutorial, hands-on coding experience.

Web

  • ğŸ”Œ Firebase UI (â­4.7k) - FirebaseUI is an open-source JavaScript library for Web that provides simple, customizable UI bindings on top of Firebase SDKs to eliminate boilerplate code and promote best practices.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firebase UI for React (â­1.3k) - React Wrapper for firebaseUI Web.
  • ğŸ”Œ GeoFire for JavaScript (â­1.4k) - Realtime location queries with Firebase.
  • ğŸ’¡ FirePad (â­3.9k) - Collaborative Text Editor Powered by Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ Ember Fire (â­684) - Official Ember data adapter for Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firebase Dart (â­402) - Dart wrapper for Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ PolymerFire (â­457) - Polymer Web Components for Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ VueFire (â­3.9k) - Firebase bindings for Vue.js.
  • ğŸ”Œ Angular Fire 2 (â­7.8k) - Official library for Firebase and Angular.
  • ğŸ”Œ Re-base (â­2.1k) - Relay inspired library for building React.js + Firebase applications.
  • ğŸ”Œ React Redux Firebase (â­2.5k) - Redux bindings for Firebase. Includes Higher Order Component for use with React.
  • ğŸ”Œ GatsbyJS Firebase Data Source - Query your Firebase data right into your statically generated pages with Gatsby.
  • ğŸ”Œ Apollo Link Firebase (â­405) - Provides a local GraphQL interface to RealtimeDB. DB syncs locally to device, Apollo Link provides querying into the local DB.
  • ğŸ”Œ BuckleScript Bindings for Firebase (â­42) - BuckleScript bindings for Firebase for use in ReasonML projects.
  • ğŸ’¡ Angular Firebase PWA (â­967) - Is an Angular PWA powered by Firebase. It can serve as a foundation to learn this stack and roll out more complex features.
  • ğŸ”Œ FireSQL (â­351) - Query Firestore using SQL syntax. Issues the minimum amount of queries necessary in order to get the data that you request.
  • ğŸ“– Hosting Version History - Automatic deletion of older versions of your site deployments.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firestorter (â­384) - Use Firestore in React with zero effort, using MobX (also for react-native).
  • ğŸ’¡ Nextbase (â­15) - Boilerplate of Next.js, Redux & Firebase for developers who want a quick start project.

Mobile

  • ğŸ“– Firebase Flutter Documentation - Official Firebase Flutter Setup.
  • ğŸ”Œ NativeScript plugin Firebase (â­1k) - NativeScript plugin for Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ React Native Firebase (â­12k) - Well-tested feature rich modular Firebase implementation for React Native. Supports both iOS & Android platforms.
  • ğŸ’¡ Expo Native Firebase (â­217) - Native Firebase Expo App (iOS, Android) Demo for Firestore, Notifications, Analytics, Storage, Messaging, Database.

Mobile / Android

  • ğŸ”Œ GeoFire for Java (â­670) - Realtime location queries with Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firebase UI (â­4.7k) - Optimized UI components for Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ FireXtensions (â­29) - Unofficial Kotlin Extensions for the Firebase Android SDK.

Mobile / iOS

  • ğŸ”Œ GeoFire for Objective-C (â­442) - Realtime location queries with Firebase.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firebase UI (â­1.6k) - iOS UI bindings for Firebase.
  • ğŸ’¡ MLKit - ARCore (â­11) - Example detecting objects and tags them with 3D labels in Augmented Reality. Uses Firebase ML Kit, ARCore and Firebase RTDB.
  • ğŸ’¡ MLKit - ARKit (â­34) - Example detecting objects using Firebase ML Kit and tags them with 3D labels in Augmented Reality.

Server-side (Cloud Functions, BigQuery etc) / iOS

  • ğŸ“– Firebase Admin Documentation - Official Firebase Admin SDK Server Setup.
  • ğŸ’¡ Functions Samples (â­12k) - Collection of sample apps showcasing popular use cases using Cloud Functions for Firebase.
  • ğŸ“ GraphQL Server on Cloud Functions - Host an Express server with GraphQL middleware on Cloud Functions.
  • ğŸ“ BigQuery & Google Analytics - How Do I Create a Closed Funnel in Google Analytics for Firebase Using BigQuery.
  • ğŸ“¹ Official Cloud Function #Firecasts - YouTube video series about understanding how Cloud Functions work.
  • ğŸ“ Firebase Hosting for Cloud Run Services - Dynamic content with Hosting Rewrites & Cloud Run Services.
  • ğŸ“ Scheduled (Cron) Cloud Functions for Firebase - Firebase-native Cron triggers for Firebase Cloud Functions.
  • ğŸ”Œ Integrify (â­110) - Enforce referential and data integrity in Firestore using pre-canned Cloud Functions triggers.

CLI & Editor / iOS

  • ğŸ”§ Firebase Tools (â­4.2k) - The Firebase Command Line Tools.
  • ğŸ”§ Firebase CI (â­72) - Simplified Firebase interaction for continuous integration.
  • ğŸ”§ Firebase Firestore Snippets (â­14) - Contains the snippet for both Firebase and Firestore in VS Code editor.
  • ğŸ”§ Fuego (â­218) - Firestore client CLI supporting document add/update/query with filtering and pagination.
  • ğŸ”§ Firestore Rules Generator (â­199) - Official (but experimental) Firebase Rules Generator for Cloud Firestore based on Google's Protocol Buffer format.
  • ğŸ”§ Firepit (â­25) - Firepit is a standalone, portable version of the Firebase CLI which has no depedencies (including Node.js).
  • ğŸ”§ Fireward (â­237) - Easy to use language for Firestore rules, similar to Firebase Bolt.

Other / iOS

  • ğŸ”Œ FireDrill (â­67) - Find, Edit, Add, Remove, Import, Export, and Report on your Firebase data.
  • ğŸ’¡ Unity Solutions (â­135) - Use Firebase tools to incorporate common features into your games.
  • ğŸ”Œ Firebase AIR Native Extension (â­57) - Firebase ANE collection give you access to the Google Firebase project in your AdobeAir projects supported on both Android and iOS with 100% identical ActionScript API.
  • ğŸ”Œ QtFirebase (â­286) - An effort to bring Google's Firebase C++ API to Qt + QML.
  • ğŸ“ StackBlitz to Firebase Hosting Deployments - StackBlitz (online code editor) to Firebase Hosting static deployments.
  • ğŸ”§ Flamelink - CMS for Firebase. Supports Firestore, RealtimeDatabase & Storage.
  • ğŸ“¹ Firebase Summit 2018 - All Firebase Summit 2018 talks.
  • ğŸ“¹ Firebase @ Google Cloud Next '18 - All Firebase talks @ Google Cloud Next 2018.
  • ğŸ“¹ Firebase @ Google IO '18 - All Firebase talks @ Google IO 2018.
  • ğŸ“¹ #AskFirebase YouTube Playlist - Official #AskFirebase playlist on YouTube.
  • ğŸ“ State of Firebase (mid 2019) - Cloud Next & Google I/O 2019 updates!
  • ğŸ“¹ Firebase @ Google IO '19 - All Firebase talks @ Google IO 2019.

Follow / Community

  • ğŸ“¹ ru @firebase_ru - Telegram friendly chat

Mobile

  • ğŸ’¡ Flutter Calendar App (â­78) - New Flutter application implementing a simple mobile calendar app for storing basic events into Firebase cloud database.
